refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function creates connection with MicroDAQ device. Function uses IP address which was set during MicroDAQ toolbox setup (see microdaq_setup()) or with mdaq_set_ip() call. On error function will return negative value. To close connection mdaq_close() function should be used.

listitem.para: linkID: Connection link ID (negative if unable to connect)
